# Muhammad Osama Qaseem - Full Stack Web Development Services
> Professional full stack developer specializing in MERN stack, SaaS products, AI software, Web3, and enterprise applications. Expert in ASP.NET Core 8, React, Next.js, blockchain development, and scalable architecture.

Muhammad Osama Qaseem is a full stack web developer with 4+ years of experience building production applications across Web3, SaaS, and enterprise sectors. Specializing in MERN stack development, AI-powered applications, fintech solutions, and custom backend architecture.

## Key Resources
- [Full Stack Web Development Services](https://osamaqaseem.online/#services): Complete web application development from frontend to backend using modern frameworks like React, Next.js, and ASP.NET Core 8. Expert in scalable architecture and performance optimization.
- [MERN Stack Development Services](https://osamaqaseem.online/#services): High-performance web applications using MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js. Perfect for building scalable SaaS products and modern web platforms.
- [SaaS Product Development Services](https://osamaqaseem.online/blog/how-to-build-saas-product-from-scratch): End-to-end SaaS development from MVP to production. Multi-tenant architecture, subscription management, and scalable backend infrastructure.
- [AI Software Development](https://osamaqaseem.online/blog/how-generative-ai-used-in-software-development): Building intelligent applications with generative AI and machine learning integration. Automating processes and creating smarter business solutions.
- [Web3 & Blockchain Development](https://osamaqaseem.online/#services): Decentralized applications, smart contracts, and blockchain integrations using Web3.js, Ethers.js, Solana Web3.js, MetaMask, and Jupiter DEX.
- [Fintech App Development Services](https://osamaqaseem.online/#services): Secure financial applications with payment processing, banking platforms, and regulatory compliance features.

## Featured Projects
- [ERP SaaS System](https://osamaqaseem.online/#projects): Multi-tenant enterprise solution with GraphQL, RBAC, and SQL Server. Built with ASP.NET Core 8, SOLID principles, and DDD patterns.
- [DEGN Ecosystem](https://osamaqaseem.online/#projects): Complete Web3 platform with Jupiter DEX integration. Solana-based decentralized application for token management and governance.
- [PerkUP Loyalty System](https://osamaqaseem.online/#projects): Cross-platform loyalty management system using React, TypeScript, and Flutter with Firebase integration.
- [TOKENVERSE Platform](https://osamaqaseem.online/#projects): Decentralized application for staking, swaps, and governance across multiple blockchain networks.

## Technical Expertise
- **Frontend:** React.js, Next.js, Vue.js, TypeScript, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Three.js, Redux
- **Backend:** ASP.NET Core 8, C#, .NET, SOLID Principles, DDD, Node.js, NestJS, Express.js, REST APIs, GraphQL
- **Web3 & Blockchain:** Web3.js, Ethers.js, Solana Web3.js, MetaMask, WalletConnect, Jupiter DEX, SPL Tokens
- **Databases:** SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Entity Framework Core, Mongoose, Redis
- **Mobile:** Flutter, Dart, React Native, Firebase
- **DevOps:** Docker, AWS, Vercel, CI/CD, Git
